items.sentence: I wonder why people thought that was so funny.
Tom believes Mary will do well in her new job.
I believe that I have no legal right to do so.
It was easier than I thought that it would be.
It's hard to believe Tom could murder someone.
Is it really worth what they're asking for it?
Electric guitars are often made of alder wood.
I don't know when Tom is planning to get here.
I had to plead with them to allow me to leave.
I'd definitely buy one of those if I were you.
